body.raw:
**👋 Hey!** I'm JunHyeong Chae, a software engineer from South Korea.
I have a wide range of interests in various fields of software engineering, and I'm currently focusing on `front-end development`.
I'm also passionate about traveling✈️ and Workouts at the gym 🏋️. - 🚀 Currently navigating the job market with enthusiasm. - 💼 Worked at an AdTech company (2022 - 2023). - 🎓 BSc in Information Systems Engineering(2016 - 2021).
